protective_factors: Explicit denial of intent/plan to act
Stated protective responsibility to family (husband, children)
Willingness to engage in treatment plan changes (Sertraline increase, light activity)
risk_factors: Expressed hopelessness and passive ideation (Category 1 - Wish to be dead)
Recent SSRI initiation/dose adjustment (though not the first 1-2 weeks)
clinical_actions: Increase frequency of check-ins/safety monitoring (e.g., phone call within 1 week)
